name: Mole Madness
description:
IT'S MOLE MADNESS! This mole has had enough running away from hammers, and it's time to train for some sweet revenge! Your goal is simple - crash into as many targets as you can, and swing your hammer at the hard to reach, moving ones!

CONTROLS:

ESC
Quit Game
W
Speed UpSPACE
Swing Hammer
A
Tilt LeftS
Slow Down (Hold to reverse)D
Tilt Right

The quicker you go and the more you destroy, the better your score!
